participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: A bit shy and self-deprecating, tends to overthink interactions.
participant_1.background: Grew up in a small town, moved to the city for work, and struggles with social anxiety.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and supportive, often tries to encourage others to open up.
participant_2.background: Has a background in psychology and loves to help friends navigate their feelings.
